| History                 = The Zambiji tribe were a group of savages active in the Zambiji region of Africa during the 1940's. They worshiped [[Kai-Mak (Earth-616)|Kai-Mak]] the so-called shark god. When the tribe would regularly offer human sacrifices to Kai-Mak. When they captured an American explorer and his daughter, they would arouse the attention of the inter-dimensional hero known as the [[Aarkus (Earth-616)|Vision]] who would battle and kill Kai-Mak.

With their god slain by this other worldly hero, the Vision would order them to no longer be aggressive toward strangers in their land. Their current activities are unknown.{{r|Marvel Mystery Comics #23}}
